stories.text: What are some important technological developments from the last 20 or so years that the median HN reader is likely not (fully) aware of? These may be world-changing technologies or more narrowly focused in scope. They may be well known within the relevant specialist community, but their existence or import hasnâ€™t yet filtered into the broader public consciousness. For example, cutting edge media production techniques, software development tools or workflows, materials science breakthroughs, energy storage, transportation, etc.
stories.title: Ask HN: What important recent technologies is the median HN reader unaware of?

stories.text:
Could you share your stories and thoughts on what you do to make your advice easier to accept?

I'd like to know what contributes to making advice well-received by others.
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you give advice?
